title: Video: Dom – Living In America
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/dom.jpg "dom")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8636-video-dom-living-in-america/attachment/dom)

Even though it was released in 2010, we’ve been treated to a new video for ‘_Living In America_, the stand out track from **Dom**’s EP, _Sun Bronzed Greek Gods._ It’s what you’d expect but engaging regardless. Kid’s getting fucked; parties and punches to the face are the order of the day. Should be enough to get the hype train moving for their new work.
